title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Looks like McCarthy's jump into the Speaker job included a formal committee to look at 'illegal' uses of government being done by some government people.BREAKING: Jim Jordan to Fight Deep State by Chairing “Weaponization of Goverment” Select Committeehttps://patriotalerts.com/2023/01/breaking-jim-jordan-to-fight-deep-state-by-chairing-weaponization-of-goverment-select-committee/It looks like the GOP holdouts that refused to vote for Rep. Kevin McCarthy as Speaker of the House, along with the others that struck a tough negotiating line with McCarthy before the vote debacle, actually won some important changes, as now the GOP is going to take the left’s weaponization of government seriously and fight against it.That fight will take the form of a new Select Committee chaired by Jim Jordan and meant to look into the “Weaponization of Government”, particularly the government’s collusion with Big Tech to censor stories and dissidents. The Post Millenial, reporting on what the Select Committee will investigate, reported that:    The 118th House of Representatives will see the formation of a new select committee, headed by Jim Jordan, to dig into the abuse of power and the Weaponization of Government. This investigative panel will demand emails and correspondence between the Biden administration and big tech companies, and follows the massive revelations that came to light through the recent release of the Twitter Files.According to Axios, the Select Committee was part of the deal that hardline conservatives in Congress struck with Kevin McCarthy in exchange for voting for him to become Speaker of the House....
